statements: SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE product_category = 'Electronics'
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_point
SELECT product_name, supplier_id FROM Inventory ORDER BY supplier_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT product_name, product_category, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE supplier_id = 3
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY current_stock ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, supplier_id FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_point;
SELECT product_name, product_category, supplier_id FROM Inventory WHERE product_category = 'Clothing' AND supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Inventory WHERE supplier_id = 4 OR supplier_id = 5 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_point
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, current_stock, replenishment_schedule FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < 10
SELECT product_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM inventory WHERE reorder_point > current_stock ORDER BY product_name
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_stock >= 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT product_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_point AND (replenishment_schedule = 'weekly' OR replenishment_schedule = 'monthly') ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount, customer_name FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount >= 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT product_name, current_stock, replenishment_schedule FROM inventory JOIN sales_data ON inventory.product_id = sales_data.product_id WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY replenishment_schedule ASC;

SELECT product_name, current_stock, reorder_point, sale_date, sale_amount, customer_name FROM inventory JOIN sales_data ON inventory.product_id = sales_data.product_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT product_name, last_reorder_date FROM Inventory WHERE last_reorder_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, quantity * total_price AS sales_revenue FROM Inventory JOIN Sales ON Inventory.id = Sales.product_id;
SELECT product_name, reorder_date FROM Inventory JOIN ReorderSchedule ON Inventory.id = ReorderSchedule.product_id WHERE reorder_quantity > 50 ORDER BY reorder_date ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_reorder_date FROM Inventory WHERE quantity <= 20 AND last_reorder_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.id, i.product_name, r.reorder_date, r.reorder_quantity FROM ReorderSchedule r JOIN Inventory i ON r.product_id = i.id WHERE r.reorder_quantity > 100 ORDER BY r.reorder_date DESC;
SELECT s.sale_date, i.product_name, s.quantity_sold, s.total_price FROM Sales s JOIN Inventory i ON s.product_id = i.id ORDER BY s.sale_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT i.product_name, SUM(s.quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold, SUM(s.total_price) AS total_sales FROM Sales s JOIN Inventory i ON s.product_id = i.id GROUP BY i.product_name HAVING total_quantity_sold > 100;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_point;
SELECT SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS num_replenishments FROM ReplenishmentSchedules GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_point
SELECT product_name, current_stock, sale_date, sale_amount FROM Inventory JOIN SalesData ON Inventory.product_id = SalesData.product_id
SELECT product_name, current_stock, replenishment_date, replenishment_quantity FROM Inventory JOIN ReplenishmentSchedules ON Inventory.product_id = ReplenishmentSchedules.product_id
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, price FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC, price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, price, supplier_name FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE price <= 100 AND stock_level > 0 ORDER BY supplier_name, product_name;

SELECT product_name, quantity, replenishment_date FROM products JOIN replenishment ON products.product_id = replenishment.product_id WHERE quantity_added >= 50 ORDER BY replenishment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, quantity, total_price FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY total_price DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 3 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
